name: Common Integral Patterns
latex: \int e^x dx = e^x, \quad \int \frac{1}{x} dx = \ln|x|, \quad \int \sin x dx = -\cos x
explanation: Memorizing common integral patterns speeds up calculations: ∫e^x = e^x, ∫1/x = ln|x|, ∫sin x = -cos x, ∫cos x = sin x, ∫sec² x = tan x. For polynomials, reverse the power rule: add 1 to exponent, divide by new exponent. Recognizing these patterns eliminates the need to derive each time.

steps: ∫3x²: add 1 to exponent (2→3), divide by 3: 3x³/3 = x³
